<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.56</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global</value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Vehicle Inventory </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the amount (1 is full) of repair resources in the cargo space of a repair vehicle. <br><br>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Informative </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Since Arma 3 v1.94.145939 the return value for vehicles that are not configured to have ability to repair other vehicles is -1. (Prior to that the value was negative infinity)</value></part></template>  </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''getRepairCargo''' vehicle  </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] - repair cargo value, -1 if repair cargo is not supported, 0 if the vehicle is ![[alive]] or [[isNull]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>value = [[getRepairCargo]] vehicleName;</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[setRepairCargo]], [[getAmmoCargo]], [[getFuelCargo]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="7"/><value>  </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>

<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on December 22, 2014 - 17:17 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:AgentRevolution|AgentRev]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
'''Prior to Arma 3 v1.93.145625''' If the vehicle is not [[alive]], it always returns [[Nothing]], which you should check for using [[isNil]].<br>
If the vehicle is unable to carry that type of cargo, it returns [[Number#Number_Type|-1.#IND]], which you should check for using [[finite]] or [[a_less_b | <]] 0.
</dd>
</dl>
